sources.title: The Red Menace
sources.description: Title: The Red Menace Summary: A disillusioned, bitter ex-GI gets involved with the Communist party, and winds up falling in love with one of his "instructors." At first true believers, they realize their mistake when ... Directed by: R.G. Springsteen Actors: Production Company: Republic Pictures (I) Release Date: 1 August 1949 (USA) Aspect Ratio: 1.37 : 1 A disillusioned, bitter ex-GI gets involved with the Communist party, and winds up falling in love with one of his "instructors." At first true believers, they realize their mistake when they witness Party leaders murder a member who questions the party's principles. They try to leave the party, but are marked for murder and hunted by the party's assassins.

metadata.Plot: An ex-GI becomes involved with the American Communist party, and falls in love with his instructor. The pair quickly realise their mistake, when they see how party leaders handle a member who questioned the party's principles. When they try to leave, they're marked for assassination and hunted by the party killers.
metadata.Actors: Robert Rockwell, Hanna Axmann-Rezzori, Betty Lou Gerson
